Get class IDs from the HierarchicalPartition object

get_classes-HierarchicalPartition-method.Rd

Get class IDs from the HierarchicalPartition object

# S4 method for HierarchicalPartition
get_classes(object, depth = max_depth(object))

Arguments

object

A HierarchicalPartition-class object.
depth

Depth of the hierarchy.

Value

A data frame of classes IDs. The class IDs are the node IDs where the subgroup sits in the hierarchy.

Examples

data(golub_cola_rh)
get_classes(golub_cola_rh)
#>           class
#> sample_39   001
#> sample_40   001
#> sample_42  0100
#> sample_47   011
#> sample_48  0101
#> sample_49   001
#> sample_41  0101
#> sample_43   011
#> sample_44   011
#> sample_45   011
#> sample_46   011
#> sample_70   011
#> sample_71  0100
#> sample_72  0100
#> sample_68  0101
#> sample_69  0101
#> sample_67  0100
#> sample_55   001
#> sample_56   001
#> sample_59   011
#> sample_52  0000
#> sample_53  0001
#> sample_51  0001
#> sample_50  0001
#> sample_54   011
#> sample_57  0000
#> sample_58  0000
#> sample_60  0000
#> sample_61  0000
#> sample_65  0000
#> sample_66  0100
